DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness add dexamethasone intrathecal levobupivacaine combine spinal epidural ( CSE ) analgesia vaginal delivery .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective double-blind trial include 80 primigravida vaginal delivery cervical dilatation ≥ 4 cm 50 % effacement randomly assign one two equal group ; Group L receive intrathecal levobupivacaine 0.25 % 2 mL Group LD receive intrathecal levobupivacaine 0.25 % combine dexamethasone 4 mg 2 mL . At first request analgesia , combination 0.25 % levobupivacaine 100 μg fentanyl 10 ml via epidural catheter . Further analgesia provide 7 ml 0.25 % levobupivacaine hourly . The primary outcome measure duration spinal analgesia . Secondary outcome measure include time spinal analgesia delivery , total amount epidurally administer levobupivicaine , adverse effect neuraxial block neonatal outcome .
DOC.criteria: ASA physical status I , II patient schedueled normal vaginal delivery age 1835 year old Patients refuse participate complicate pregnancy
